title: 3dSliceNDice
description: Calculates the Dice coefficient between two volumes on a slice-by-slice basis.

output_rl.title: Output RL file
output_rl.description: Output file containing Dice coefficients along the right-left axis.

output_ap.title: Output AP file
output_ap.description: Output file containing Dice coefficients along the anterior-posterior axis.

output_is.title: Output IS file
output_is.description: Output file containing Dice coefficients along the inferior-superior axis.
